title: FT/FS: N172 Old Judge Bill George Bat Ready SGC 20 - SOLD

posts.post_title: FT/FS: N172 Old Judge Bill George Bat Ready SGC 20 - SOLD
posts.post_content:
I just got this back from SGC. Asking $SOLD obo and will consider trades for E90’s I need or T206’s.
